actions.name: Ripen
actions.description: Effect: The healing effects of equipped [Natural][Food] items are doubled for the user. As a Camp Action, the user can convert any equipped [Natural][Food] items into ripened versions, doubling their effects. [Ripened][Food] items are not affected further by this Ability.
